title: Best font for a new fashion label
content:
I´m right in the middle of starting a t-shirt-label called "Riot in Paris".

Target audience: m/f, 18-30 yrs old, electronic music lovers.

I´m looking for the best font, which I will use for the logo and most of the motives.

It has to be young, contemporary, plain and striking (and maybe a little bit aggressive due to the "Riot").

Any ideas?

I appreciate your help!
author: trickynicky

comments.content:
_plain and striking_

Is that like mild and aggressive?

@ nick: very nice! thanks!

@ beat: yeah right

@ stephen: with "plain" I meant clear, easy to read, sans serifs

_very nice_

I think [anita bonghit](http://web.archive.org/web/20120311031140/http:/www.omfestival.ca/viewtopic.php?p=102482&sid=4b310325bcf3ba6f6b3c570e652d54fb) liked it too :-)
I think I saw a poster with that name on it somewhere...Toronto?
